title: How to Make a No Bake Banana Bread

steps.headline: Mash the banana in a glass bowl.
Add 1 teaspoon of vanilla and baking soda.
Put your bowl in the microwave for 1 minute.
Take it out and check with a toothpick.
steps.description: It is cooked if the toothpick is clean after you poke the middle of the bread. If it isn't clean, try popping it back in the microwave for about 10-30 seconds.

text: Mash the banana in a glass bowl.  Add 2 tablespoons of sugar.  Add 5 tablespoons of flour.  Add 1 teaspoon of vanilla and baking soda.  Add 1 tablespoon of melted butter.  Mix everything together.  Put your bowl in the microwave for 1 minute.  Take it out and check with a toothpick. It is cooked if the toothpick is clean after you poke the middle of the bread. If it isn't clean, try popping it back in the microwave for about 10-30 seconds. Finished.
